issue.title: [CF 868] Unit classification condition not working
issue.body:
I've tried to use "world boss" to check if my target is a boss (cause non stunnable units react differently towards storm bolt). However Raid bosses don't seem to pass the condition. Either there's an unintended behavior here or raid bosses are just missing.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #868 | Raw

comments.body:
Raid bosses aren't world bosses. Regardless, it looks like Blizzard has stop classifying anything as a world boss for the purposes of UnitClassification (at least Sha of Anger isn't), so that part of the condition is effectively useless now unless you want to know if you are targeting Doomwalker, Kazzak, or Omen.

Use a Unit Level and an Instance Type condition together to check if something is a raid boss.

Edited Oct 3, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
